des: The Podcast Series " The New Chemist"- where we discuss chemistry which simply put is the science of change, as well as careers, community, and research. This podcast is currently sponsored by : Anchor and MEL Science. Also it is sponsored by Instacart. https://instacart.oloiyb.net/zaRKKr. Thanks for listening.
